option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/gradient_warm_bg" android:fitsSystemWindows="true" tools:context=".SplashActivity">
<!-- Hero Illustration Background (decorative, semi-transparent) --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/img_hero_bg" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:contentDescription="@string/splash_hero" android:alpha="0.08" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- Centered Logo Container with glossy card design --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/card_logo_container" android:layout_width="140dp" android:layout_height="140dp" app:cardCornerRadius="20dp" app:cardElevation="12dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@id/tv_app_name">
<FrameLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<!-- Glossy overlay gradient --> <View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/gradient_glossy_overlay" android:alpha="0.1" />
<ImageView android:id="@+id/img_logo" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:contentDescription="@string/app_name" android:padding="2dp" android:scaleType="centerInside" android:src="@drawable/applogo" />
<!-- Logo Image --> </FrameLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- App Name --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tv_app_name" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/app_name" android:textSize="32sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="#1A3A52" android:layout_marginTop="32dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/card_logo_container" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- Tagline/Subtitle --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tv_tagline" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/app_tagline" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="#1A3A52" android:alpha="0.65" android:gravity="center" android:paddingHorizontal="32dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/tv_app_name" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- Loading Indicator --> <ProgressBar android:id="@+id/progress_loading" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:indeterminate="true" android:indeterminateTint="#FF6B3F" android:layout_marginBottom="60dp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- Version/Build Info (optional) --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tv_version" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/app_version" android:textSize="10sp" android:textColor="#1A3A52" android:alpha="0.4" android:layout_margin="16dp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
